item.title: Get notified
item.description: org-mode is definitely one of the most versatile notes & planning tools I have ever seen. Itâ€™s also number one in my daily GTD practices. Recently, I discovered one tiny feature which makes my work with org-mode even sweeter - notifications. Suppose you have just planned a super-duper important meeting with your girlfriend. As natural born programmer, you have already created entry in you org-mode planner. Unfortunately, org-mode by default will not warn you about upcoming event.
